alert.note: Alert for Doddridge; Pleasants; Ritchie; Tyler; Wirt; Wood (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 1:24AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Heavy showers and thunderstorms will impact portions of Washington, Pleasants, Ritchie, southwestern Doddridge, Wirt, western Tyler and Wood Counties through 145 AM EDT... At 122 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking heavy rain and thunderstorms over Belpre, moving northeast at 85 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Parkersburg, Marietta, Belpre, Harrisville, St. Marys, Elizabeth, Middlebourne, Vienna, Williamstown, Sistersville, Pennsboro, Belmont, Mineralwells, North Bend State Park, Lubeck, Boaz, Washington, Newport, Matamoras and North Hills. This includes the following highways... Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 162 and 186. Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 1 and 13. Route 50 in West Virginia between mile markers 1 and 52. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Doddridge; Pleasants; Ritchie; Tyler; Wirt; Wood
